title: Kayle, Kayle skin and sum icon
body: So its 2016, been playing for a while now and i see this "Kayle free skin, sum icon as thanks for 4 years" or something, im like sick i get kayle skin and stuff. I was only banned for a cruddy connection once back like 2 years ago but other than that i have a clean record. 23rd comes along and i still dont have it {{item:3070}} . Who do i contact for this?

replies.body: Gifts are being sent out still, and behavioral occurrences won't disqualify anyone for them.  Stay up today on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we continue to distribute the gifts to the many eligible accounts.  It's coming!
The gifts are still being distributed, and the final date to receive them has been pushed back to the 30th as per the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).
